trans-unit.source: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform integer validation on a configuration property.
This class cannot be inherited.

You use the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute> attribute to decorate a configuration property, which will instruct the .NET Framework to validate the property using the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator> object and pass to it the value of the decorating parameters.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute> 구성 속성을 사용 하 여 속성을 검사할.NET Framework 지시 하기를 데코레이팅하는 특성은 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator> 개체를 데코레이팅 매개 변수의 값을 전달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can apply <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute> attributes to property types only.
trans-unit.target: 적용할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute> 속성 형식에만 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to decorate the properties of a custom <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> object using the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 사용자 지정 속성을 데코레이팅하 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> 를 사용 하 여 개체는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute> 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute" /> class.
You use this constructor in the attributed model to assure that the value assigned to the related property is an integer.
trans-unit.target: 특성 사용 모델에서 관련된 속성에 할당 된 값은 정수가이 생성자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> 생성자를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include or exclude the integers in the range defined by the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue" /> and <see cref="P:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue" /> property values.
<see langword="true" /> if the value must be excluded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 값을 제외 해야 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
The range is inclusive of the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 범위는 포함 된 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> 및 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ExcludeRange%2A> property value is `true`, the allowed values are outside the range.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ExcludeRange%2A> 속성 값은 `true`, 허용 되는 값은 범위를 벗어납니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ExcludeRange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ExcludeRange%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum value allowed for the property.
An integer that indicates the allowed maximum value.
The <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> property value is included in the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> 속성 값은 허용 되는 범위에 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <see cref="P:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue" />.
Gets or sets the minimum value allowed for the property.
An integer that indicates the allowed minimum value.
The <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> property value is included in the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> 속성 값은 허용 되는 범위에 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is greater than <see cref="P:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue" />.
Gets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase" /> validator instance.

You use the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ValidatorInstance%2A> property to perform string validation by calling its <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ValidatorInstance%2A> 속성을 호출 하 여 문자열의 유효성을 검사 해당 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator.Validate%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ValidatorInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.ValidatorInstance%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.
